import { useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { LOGIN_USER } from "../../API"; import defaultProfile from '../../assets/images/account_circle.png'; import { signOutAction } from "../../redux/users/actions"; export default function ProfileHeader(props) { const { user, openModalMenu, setOpenModalMenu } = props; const [openModalSignOut, setOpenModalSignOut] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const signOutHandler = () => { dispatch(signOutAction()); localStorage.removeItem(LOGIN_USER); setOpenModalSignOut(false); navigate("/"); }; return ( <>
setOpenModalMenu(false)} className="custom-modal--bg">
setOpenModalMenu(false)} className="pic arrow-down">
    {user.name}
    {user.email}
  • Edit Profile
  • View Profile
  • setOpenModalSignOut(true)} className="user-menu-link" to="#"> Logout
setOpenModalSignOut(false)} className="custom-modal--bg" >
Are you sure you want to sign out?
); }
